thread.section_title: OldCarOnline.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of OldCarOnline.com | oldcaronline.com
thread.title: Christian Zummer

author: Christian Zummer
title: Christian Zummer
text:
I had a great experience using this site. My uncle was trying to sell his MG Midget. Selling British cars can be difficult, as you have to find someone who enjoys them as much as you do. Our local market is pretty limited, as far as potential buyers are concerned, but by using the site, a buyer from outside Chicago was able to find our posting, and the car was exactly what he and his wife had been looking for!
I would have no issues recommending this site to anyone looking to buy or sell a classic car.
